pli-tv-bu-vb-pc86:1.1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sakkesu viharati kapilavatthusmiṃ nigrodhārāme.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc86:1.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarena dantakārena bhikkhū pavāritā honti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc86:1.1.4: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū bahū sūcighare viññāpenti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc86:1.1.5: Yesaṃ khuddakā sūcigharā te mahante sūcighare viññāpenti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc86:1.1.6: Yesaṃ mahantā sūcigharā te khuddake sūcighare viññāpenti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc86:1.1.7: Atha kho so dantakāro bhikkhūnaṃ bahū sūcighare karonto na sakkoti aññaṃ vikkāyikaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ kātuṃ, attanāpi na yāpeti, puttadāropissa kilamati.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc86:1.1.9: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā na mattaṃ jānitvā bahū sūcighare viññāpessanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc86:1.1.10: Ayaṃ imesaṃ bahū sūcighare karonto na sakkoti aññaṃ vikkāyikaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ kātuṃ, attanāpi na yāpeti, puttadāropissa kilamatī”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc86:1.1.11: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhū tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc86:1.1.12: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā … pe … te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc86:1.1.14: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhū na mattaṃ jānitvā bahū sūcighare viññāpessantī”ti … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc86:1.1.15: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhū na mattaṃ jānitvā bahū sūcighare viññāpentī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc86:1.1.18: kathañhi nāma te, bhikkhave, moghapurisā na mattaṃ jānitvā bahū sūcighare viññāpessanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc86:1.1.19: Netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc86:1.1.20: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc86:1.1.21: “Yo pana bhikkhu aṭṭhimayaṃ vā dantamayaṃ vā visāṇamayaṃ vā sūcigharaṃ kārāpeyya bhedanakaṃ, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc86:2.1.4: … pe … ayaṃ imasmiṃ atthe adhippeto bhikkhūti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc86:2.1.13: karoti vā kārāpeti vā, payoge dukkaṭaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc86:2.1.15: Attanā vippakataṃ attanā pariyosāpeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc86:2.1.16: Attanā vippakataṃ parehi pariyosāpeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc86:2.1.17: Parehi vippakataṃ attanā pariyosāpeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc86:2.1.18: Parehi vippakataṃ parehi pariyosāpeti, āpatti pācittiyassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc86:2.1.19: Aññassatthāya karoti vā kārāpeti vā, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc86:2.1.20: Aññena kataṃ paṭilabhitvā paribhuñjati, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
